alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 08 at 2:44PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 17 inches possible in the higher elevations and 4 to 8 in the lower valleys. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Centennial Mountains, Island Park and Beaverhead-Lemhi Highlands, including Monida Pass, Reynolds Pass, Targhee Pass and Ashton Hill. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
